about_the_game:
Nethermage is an exciting adventure filled with non-stop action and strategic choices within a vibrant auto-shooter survivor world.

With the cosmos unraveling and bizarre rifts releasing monstrous creatures, it's up to you, the guardian mage bird, to stop the Nether's invasion of monsters and elder gods.

Equip yourself with powerful capes, hats, and spells to unleash incredible abilities necessary for defeating waves of enemies.

Explore a detailed ability tree, fulfill unique prophecies, and take on mighty bosses while collecting glowing starlit rewards to enhance your strength.

Key features:

  • Dive into fast-paced auto-shooter battles as you vanquish hordes in the dark and mysterious Nether!

  • Step into the role of the guardian mage bird, using inventive spells, cool gear, and a dynamic ability tree to tackle constant challenges.

  • Strategically choose and combine your power-ups—capes, hats, and spells—for innovative gameplay and powerful combat techniques.

  • Complete prophecy challenges, such as defeating specific monsters, evolving weapons and staying alive to earn substantial rewards and progress the story.

  • Interact with a variety of charming NPCs to gain special buffs and discover secrets, enriching your experience.

  • Face colossal bosses, testing the full extent of your skills in epic battles.

  • Immerse yourself in stylish visuals and energetic audio that draw you into the mystique of the Nether.

Gear up for a thrilling journey in Nethermage, where your abilities stand as the safeguard between peace and chaos!
